name: Starcaster
description: A challenging arcade side-scroller where you defeat enemies, fight bosses, level up, and unlock upgrades and new spells. Get upgrades after each run to go farther in subsequent tries. Even with full upgrades, completing all ten worlds in one run is no easy task!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space
